definition: nonsense/rubbish/superfluous words/You don't say!/No kidding! (gently sarcastic)
to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
variant of 廢|废[fei4]/disabled
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
old variant of 話|话[hua4]
a bunch of nonsense/verbose and rambling
to talk nonsense/to bullshit

sentences.english: Their statement was a downright inanity.
sentences.chinese: 他们的声明是彻头彻尾的废话。

sentences.english: There is no sadness, not so much nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么不舍，没有那么多废话。

sentences.english: Otherwise my answer now will be rubbish.
sentences.chinese: 否则，我现在的回答将是废话。

sentences.english: I'm tired of your crap. I'm not going to put up with it any more.
sentences.chinese: 我对你的废话烦透了，我不会再忍耐下去了。

sentences.english: So, here to say nonsense, " for the little cannon of Peucedanum card".
sentences.chinese: 所以，在这里说一句废话，“争取在点炮之前胡牌”。

sentences.english: I ve never heard such a rigmarole .
sentences.chinese: 我从来没听过像这样的长篇废话。

sentences.english: Less B. S. and more facts, please.
sentences.chinese: 请少讲点废话，多讲点事实。

sentences.english: A sensible man's sensor is sensitive to nonsense on census.
sentences.chinese: 明笨者的传感器对人口调查废话敏感。

sentences.english: The fool who caused you to pluck angrily at your hair may have been speaking words that you felt held little meaning.
sentences.chinese: 让你狠抓头发的傻瓜可能是一个满嘴废话的人。

sentences.english: Would you kindly tell me the meaning of the poem called 'Jabberwocky'?
sentences.chinese: 你可不可以好心地告诉我那首叫‘废话’的诗的意思？

sentences.english: No awkward goodbyes, no "still friends" bullshit.
sentences.chinese: 没有尴尬的道别，没有“还是朋友”的废话。

sentences.english: I hear you talking loud, but you don’t do shit.
sentences.chinese: 我能听到你大声地讲话，基本上都是废话。

sentences.english: And don't give me any of that nonsense about a woman's place being in the home .
sentences.chinese: 别跟我说那些“女人应该在家相夫教子”的废话。

sentences.english: I said to myself, you let me try, this no-nonsense what.
sentences.chinese: 我心说，你让我抓了试一试，这不废话吗。

definition: incorrect variant of 囉嗦|啰嗦[luo1 suo5]
long-winded/wordy/troublesome/pesky/also pr. [luo1 suo1]
to talk at length/to waste one's breath/variant of 廢話|废话[fei4 hua4]
shit/nonsense
to chatter/nonsense/blather
to talk nonsense
to talk irresponsibly/to talk nonsense
truth
to talk rubbish
conventional greeting/polite formula
lit. to go on a long detour/fig. to speak vaguely around the topic without getting to the point/to beat about the bush
lit. going round the curves and skirting the corners (idiom)/fig. to speak in a roundabout way/to equivocate/to beat about the bush
not to feel like (doing sth)/disinclined to
to argue needlessly/to waste time explaining
Shut up!/same as 閉上嘴巴|闭上嘴巴
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
